abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise priority
            components of the Government's program to rehabilitate
            flood damaged facilities.  It would include:  (a)
            rehabilitation of irrigation, drainage and flood protection
            works; (b) rehabilitate work on roads and associated
            structures; and (c) procurement of road construction
            equipment.  It would furthermore; (d) replace navigational
            aids and water gauging equipment; (e) repair river landing
            jetties; and (f) provide technical services by local and
            foreign consultants.
